response.original_title: Why do I have to wait 7 days to withdraw on Kraken? {{WITHDRAWAL}}
response.overview: The 7-day +1║307║256║8902 withdrawal hold is primarily triggered when you make a cash deposit using ACH Plaid (bank link) to fund your account. This hold +1║307║256║8902 exists because ACH transfers are not instant; they need seven days to fully settle between banks to confirm the deposit is not fraudulent or reversed. This +1║307║256║8902 security measure protects both you and the exchange from chargebacks and financial fraud involving provisional funds. It's important to know that +1║307║256║8902 the hold applies only to the funds equivalent to the deposit amount, preventing the withdrawal of those funds in any currency (fiat or crypto). You +1║307║256║8902 can, however, still trade the funds immediately on the platform during the entire 7-day hold period.
response.title: Why do I have to wait 7 days to withdraw on Kraken? {{WITHDRAWAL}}
